AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Musician
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoyed making music, so much so SHE made a fairly sucessful career out of it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Stylist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a beautician, chatting with clients, carefully trimming hair, and using her additional limbs to achieve heights of hair-cutting perfection never before achieved.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Hive worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} lived in a planet sized hive-world. She worked in a massive production center with thousands or tens of thousands of other workers.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Psy operative
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: BlackWidows are possessed of incredible latent psy abilities, and {PAWN_nameDef} used these abilities to secure herself a cushy position as a glitterworld police officer. All was going well, and she was only a short time away from a cushy retirement, until she discovered something she shouldn't have regarding a local politician's son.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Construction worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoyed her work, building large structures both in space and on solid ground as a constructor-mech pilot. While she didn't plan the buildings themselves, she took pride in her work.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mech engineer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} worked hard, day in, and day out, studying and fixing mechs for the Black Widows navy. She earned a reputation for being able to fix anything that was carried into her workshop, garnering much acclaim.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: First responder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} frequently tended to minor workplace accidents, providing first-responce care, and first-aid to small injuries. While SHE scarcely had to deal with major accidents, HER work taught HER much about patching wounds.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Ecumenopolis scientist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} lived in one of the densely populated hive-worlds of the Black Widows empire. She worked in a massive science center with thousands of other intellectuals.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Resource-procurement specialist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Resources are critical for expansion, and {PAWN_nameDef} was one of many in charge of gathering them. SHE would go to deposits, program the constructor mechs to set up equipment, and do what was nessessary to extract all valuable resources.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Exploration officer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Exploration is always needed, be it across the surface of a planet, down in the depths of the ocean, or up in the darkest reaches of space, and {PAWN_nameDef} was one who was out there searching. She searched, charted, logged, and explored, searching for new opportunities for her species.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Terrorist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: There are many ways to express oneself, but {PAWN_nameDef} did so in a dangerous and illegal way. She spread terror in the name of her ideology.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cultist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was part of the Curators, a religous cult of Black Widows Reavers that worshipped an extradimensional entity. Their leader was devoured by the entity they worshipped and they were forced to scatter, but the members of the cult still lurk... waiting for their leader's prophesied ressurection.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Weaponsmith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Any civilization finds themselves eventuially in war, either with themselves, or others. {PAWN_nameDef} was a designer of weapons of war, and she, along with others of her design team, made and improved weapons that have killed many, many people.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Scientist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a researcher for the BlackWidow Empire. She dedicated her life to discovering the unknown.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Xeno zookeeper
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} worked at one of the many Xeno Zoos in the BlackWidow Empire and was very fond of the sentient captives contained within.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Colonizer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is part of the effort to expand the BlackWidow Empire.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Doctor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} has dedicated HER life to healing others.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Ambassador
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: With the generally xenophilic opinion BlackWidows hold toward aliens, {PAWN_nameDef} took pride in her work as a foreign ambassador. She regularly met and kept goodwill with many xeno species.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mech officer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} led one of the infamous squads of Mechs that the Black Widows use in combat.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nurse
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} made a living as a nurse working hospice care in a non-Black Widows' controlled glitter world.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Navy cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} served as a chef in the Black Widow navy.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Survivor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} served in the Black Widow mech corps. After serving in an invasion force against a rival army, she was the only survivor in her squad in a failed invasion attempt.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Hydroponics worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} worked in a giant hydroponics facility on one of the hive-world in the BlackWidow Empire. Given the high population densities they often reach, Black Widows' citizens require a great deal of food to survive. As a result, NAME's expertise in Plants food and maintaining the machinery that kept the facility operational was highly valued and she became quite conceited.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Reaver warrior
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} has been genetically engineered as a psionic warrior known as a Reaver. Trained to use her powers to devastating effect in hit-and-run raid style combat and geurilla campaigns, she is fearsome when provoked.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Transcendent desirer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is a transcendent desirer--a lay-widow belonging to a state sanctioned fertility cult. On behalf of the Black Widows empire, she indoctrinates potential mates, either by searching them out in alien civilizations or serving in one of the xenos processing centers run by the Reavers caste. Regardless, she knows how to entice and seduce over a thousand compatible species and has borne many broodlings.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Black widow fallen broodmother
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a headmother of her planet's Transcendent fertility cult. A scandal following her post-coital murder of a high ranking human official's son led to a fall from grace.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Holovid star
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} has made a name for herself performing in spider themed adult holovids. Who doesn't love spiders?

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Palace child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was born on the Black Widow capital planet of Amadit's Husk. She was born to a wealthy family living in the gilded caves at the planet's hollowed out core.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Designer baby
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was genetically engineered to be a perfect child.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Spacer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was born on a space ship and spent most of their childhood on one ship or another. The close quarters meant that she had to be friendly with her neighbors and had to know how to maintain the ship SHE was on.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Colonizer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} grew up in a fledgling colony. She had to make due without assistance from the Widow empire.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Bully
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a bully. She enjoyed roughing up the other children, and was very good at avoiding getting caught.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Repentant bully
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} used to be a bully, but then she messed with someone who fought back. The experience left her scarred, and she prefers to avoid fighting at all.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Stargazer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: The stars always facinated {PAWN_nameDef}, and knowing that one day she could go out amongst them drove her through her education at a very directed pace.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Military child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: The BlackWidow Navy always facinated {PAWN_nameDef}. She often visited military bases and watched weapon tests.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Gaia child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was born on a Gaia planet, a planet perfectly suited for nearly any carbon based life form. She benifited from a near perfect enviroment to grow up in.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Ecumenopolis child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was born in a planet sized city. She had to grow up with a population of potentially trillions, crowded condtions, and a lifestyle geared towards industry and science.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Colonizer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is from a high-gravity planet. As such, she is stronger then most.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cavern crawler
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} grew from a broodling in one of the many cavern temples in Amadit's Husk, building strength by finding HER way to the tops of caves.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Digger
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was born on a more temperate hive-world and could frequently be found digging in the mud as a child, excavating potholes in the garden. She also learned a little about re-planting when she was forced to fix what was dug.
